channel.title: Productivity on Kinyanjui Wangonya
channel.description: Recent content in Productivity on Kinyanjui Wangonya

item.title: Why I deleted Facebook, Twitter and Instagram... and turned to Dev.to
item.description: I’ve always felt like social media was taking up a little bit too much of my time, but as a freelance dev just starting out, I felt like I needed it. How would I get my work out there? How would I make connections with other developers? How would I get clients? All these were reasons that made me (somewhat reluctantly) maintain my presence on the various social platforms… until I read “Deep Work” by Cal Newport.
